attributes.action: Stop implementation of contract 6 being enforced on workers in Asda/Sainsburys.
attributes.additional_details: Information and reports on both social and other media is widely reported to substantiate these claims.
attributes.background:
I have worked nights in retail for over 15 years, under this new contract we will face losing money, as have many others already.
Reportedly 3k by some workers already forced to sign. New colleagues auto enrol onto this contract which has many flaws for the workers and their rights.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of your employer and not the UK Government or Parliament.
